item.title: Machine Learning Overview
item.description: Regression Problem Different Types of Regressions Example used: Build a model to predict housing prices. Included metrics are population, median income and median housing price. Multiple Regression: use multiple feature (use district population, the median income) s to make a prediction Univariate [[Regression]]: only predict a single value for the output Multivariate [[Regression]]: predict multiple values per district Performance Measure Typical Performance measures for regression problems is the Root Mean Square Error
